text: Fresh Air is an American radio talk show broadcast on National Public Radio stations across the United States since 1985. It is produced by WHYY-FM in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The show's host is Terry Gross. , the show was syndicated to 624 stations and claimed nearly 5 million listeners. In 2016, Fresh Air was the most-downloaded podcast on iTunes. ==References== Category:1975 establishments in the United States Category:Radio programs
title: Fresh Air
